<html><head><style type="text/css"><!-- DIV {margin:0px;} --></style></head><body><div style="font-family:times new roman, new york, times, serif;font-size:12pt"><DIV style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, new york, times, serif">Malice:</DIV>
<DIV style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, new york, times, serif"> </DIV>
<DIV style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, new york, times, serif">Malice's form remained limp, though some of his systems were still very active.  A display appeared on his right forearm and it displayed a power distrobution map and several attempts to route main power were made but failed.  A connection to auxillary power was made to recieve a transmission, then a long line of encrypted code, then a five minute countdown began.<BR><BR></DIV>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; MARGIN: 5px 0px 5px 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, new york, times, serif">----- Original Message ----<BR>From: xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...><BR>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com<BR>Sent: Monday, May 19, 2008 10:55:42 PM<BR>Subject: Re: Fw: Evil Revelations<BR><BR>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>
<P>Perceptr/Nighlight:<BR><BR>"You will see"said Perceptor who typed some buttons and the pod's <BR>started to close, Nighlight took a last sight of Rodimus and a tear <BR>fall, then closed her eyes, she was lost thought hopeless the <BR>femme.Perceptor continued typing and said to Rodimus"I'll set her in a <BR>stasis but in that way that nobody could freed her without harm her <BR>spark... it was a sor of lock. Tell me the true, are you starting to <BR>feel some concern for her?''"<BR><BR></P></DIV></DIV></div><br>

      </body></html>
